codeReview.summary: Implementation matches the feature contract: `.hints(fn)` and `.onError(fn)` were added to `CommandBuilder`, typed as transport-local hint functions returning `CLIHint[]`, stored on the builder/command metadata (not invoked during build/handler execution), covered by focused tests, and shipped with a minor changeset.

summary: Reviewed commit 31ab3f8c and found the feature complete against its description and expected behavior. No blocking or non-blocking code issues were identified, and no shared-state documentation gaps were observed from this implementation transcript.
